Description: TasksRoles & Responsibilities·Perform the BW application management for VANs·Maintain and develop BW applictions - end to end with focus on BW backend·Testing of BW applications·BW application monitoring and alerting·Analysis of incident tickets ·Manage data load schedules and solve process chains failures·Communication with business users or CoC members·Proactive identification, escalation and resolution of issues·Improve support model and CoC collaborationQualifications - External·Experience & Good Knowledge in all BW  key areas covering architecture, modelling ,extraction, ETL, performance management & Reporting·Experience & Good Knowledge in LSA ++ architecture ·Experience & Good Knowledge in BW on HANA concepts Hybrid Modelling including Native HANA Models, ability provide best practices & design complex solutions.·Extensive experience with analysis, design, development, customization and BW analytics·Proficiency in analysing and translating business requirements to technical requirements and architecture.·Understanding of Scripting and ABAP based planning functions·Working experience on AFO/SAC·Ability to understand & manage ABAP Code and BADI·Experience with operating and supporting BW applications ·Experience in Planning templates, SAP BPC reports, Input Schedules, Data manager packages, Scripts.·Should have worked in AMDP functionalities and knowledge of stored procedures·ITIL Knowhow·Knowledge about automotive industry and / or production Nice to have: Completion of BW projects along with their transition to line functions / daily operationRoles & Responsibilities·Perform the BW application management for VANs·Maintain and develop BW applictions - end to end with focus on BW backend·Testing of BW applications·BW application monitoring and alerting·Analysis of incident tickets ·Manage data load schedules and solve process chains failures·Job Details
